data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Nice throw-in in Reims's half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Reims.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 9, Reims are whistled for offside.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Reims's Boulaye Dia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Reims, Jeff Reine-Adelaide of Nice is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 11, Reims needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
Stephanie Frappart waits before resuming play because Yunis Abdelhamid for Reims is still down.
Nice drive upfield and Amine Gouiri gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Reims defender.
In the minute 14, Nice have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Reims.
Yunis Abdelhamid is back on the pitch.
In the minute 14, Nice are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nice to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In the minute 16, Hicham Boudaoui (Nice) has received a yellow card from Stephanie Frappart.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 19, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Stephanie Frappart awards Reims a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Nice.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Reims are pushing forward but Mathieu Cafaro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Nice have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Mathieu Cafaro for Reims drives towards goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 36, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims have a goal kick.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 38, Nice to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In Reims Reims attack through Moussa Doumbia. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Reims, Reims push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Reims.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Stephanie Frappart signals a Nice throw-in in Reims's half.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 47, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Corner awarded to Nice.
Reims push forward at Stade Auguste Delaune and Mathieu Cafaro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nice defence.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Reims.
Arber Zeneli of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 52, Reims are coming forward and Valon Berisha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Rony Lopes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nice.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Nice.
Dan Ndoye is on a sub for Rony Lopes for Nice.
In the minute 56, Stephanie Frappart awards Nice a goal kick.
Throw-in Reims.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nice pushes forward through Amine Gouiri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Stephanie Frappart signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Reims's area.
In the minute 58, Nice to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
At Stade Auguste Delaune, Boulaye Dia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 60, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hicham Boudaoui for Nice gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Reims close to the penalty box.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 65, In Reims Reims's Boulaye Dia is caught offside.
El Bilal Toure is replacing Mathieu Cafaro for the home team.
David Guion (Reims) is making a second substitution, with Dereck Kutesa replacing Moussa Doumbia.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Arber Zeneli with Nathanael Mbuku. This is the third substitution made today by David Guion.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Nice.
In the minute 68, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Reims.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Free kick Reims.
Stanley N`Soki for Nice is back on the field again.
In the minute 73, Play has been interrupted briefly in Reims to check on Stanley N`Soki, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team replace Hassane Kamara with Racine Coly.
In the minute 74, Adrian Ursea is making the team's third substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Kephren Thuram Ulien replacing Hicham Boudaoui.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Stephanie Frappart awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Nice.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In Reims Nice drive forward through Amine Gouiri. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 81, Kaj Sierhuis is replacing Boulaye Dia for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Can Reims capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 85, Danilo (Nice) gets a yellow card.
Reims's Valon Berisha breaks free at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Free kick Reims.
In the minute 87, Adrian Ursea is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Andy Pelmard replacing Jordan Lotomba.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 89, Reims have a goal kick.
Marshall Munetsi of Reims gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nice have a goal kick.
At Stade Auguste Delaune the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Nice.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
